title: buying and Trading for T206 White sox!
author: milkit1

posts.post_title: buying and Trading for T206 White sox!
posts.post_content:
Looking for the following:  
Burns

Isbell
Scott

Tannehill non follow through 
Walsh

Heres what i got to trade:


T202

Weimer
Donahue

Mccormick (spot loss on back)
Bridwell (some creasing)
Scheckard
Pfeister
mcbride (trim)
Demmitt (trim)

E90-1
Donlin trimmed but nice near mint appearance

Colgans proof
Pfeister (miscut)

P2 Sweet caporal pins:
Bresnahan PSA5
Devore PSA 4
Bryne PSA 4
Mclean (mint)
Gray (real nice looking)

1933 goudey
Too many to name send me an email!

1933 Goudey signed
too many send me an email!
